title: This Is the Old Testament Week 2 with David Filson
description:
Join Raechel and Amanda along with pastor and professor David Filson for the second week of This Is the Old Testament. Together, these three take a look at the historical books of Joshua, Judges, Ruth, and 1 & 2 Samuel—reminiscing on familiar stories and rejoicing in the discovery of connections between these books and the whole of Scripture. As they survey these five books, they continually point to God’s faithfulness to Israel and His preserving work throughout the narrative of the Old Testament. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth This Is the Old Testament reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 


Shop the This Is the Old Testament Reading Plan collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 


Show notes can be found at https://shereadstruth.com/podcast/this-is-the-old-testament-week-2-with-david-filson/
